title: MindFlow AI
tagline: Transform your thoughts into structured workflows
description: MindFlow AI helps you convert scattered ideas into actionable workflows using advanced AI. Simply speak or type your thoughts, and watch as they transform into organized project plans, task lists, and visual roadmaps. Perfect for entrepreneurs, creators, and teams who want to turn ideas into reality faster.

title: DesignSync Pro
tagline: Real-time design collaboration for distributed teams
description: DesignSync Pro revolutionizes how design teams collaborate across time zones. Features include live design sessions, version control with visual diffs, automated design system updates, and seamless handoff to developers. Built specifically for modern remote teams who demand pixel-perfect collaboration.

title: CodeCrafter Mobile
tagline: Build and deploy apps directly from your phone
description: CodeCrafter Mobile lets you code, test, and deploy mobile apps using only your smartphone. Features a touch-optimized code editor, built-in emulator, cloud compilation, and one-tap deployment to app stores. Perfect for developers who want to code on the go or prototype ideas instantly.

title: DataViz Studio
tagline: Create stunning data visualizations without coding
description: DataViz Studio makes complex data beautiful and understandable. Drag-and-drop interface, AI-powered chart suggestions, real-time collaboration, and export to any format. Connect to 50+ data sources including databases, APIs, and spreadsheets. Transform your data into compelling stories.

title: SecureVault Pro
description: SecureVault Pro provides bank-level security for your team's passwords and sensitive data. Features include biometric authentication, zero-knowledge encryption, automated password rotation, dark web monitoring, and detailed audit logs. Trusted by Fortune 500 companies worldwide.
